name: Eclipsed Blade | DEMO
description:
Eclipsed Blade is an upcoming adventure text-based game where your choices control the story.  

The adventure takes place in the beautiful Vrusal Empire, which unfortunately is in a war due to the lack of an heir to the throne. Your story begins in a small village called Anceross that goes through times of starvation.

After your village will be attacked by invaders from over the sea, you will begin your journey to unravel the mystery of a sword that belonged to your grandfather, but also to find out who are the ones who destroyed your village.
